## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.enable() method

Enables the specified value(s) by updating their disable state.

If the value is currently disabled, it will be enabled. If the value is currently enabled, it will remain enabled.


**Signature:**

```typescript
enable(value: T | T[]): void;
```

value


</td><td>

T \| T\[\]


</td><td>

The value or array of values to be enabled.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
